## YearTemporalRangesTariff class

An extension of [TemporalRangesTariff](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariff.md) with support for an additional year range constraint.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export default class YearTemporalRangesTariff extends TemporalRangesTariff 
```
**Extends:** [TemporalRangesTariff](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariff.md)
